data: {mood:happy}Those clothes! You're an alchemist!!{break}I am SO glad you've arrived at last.{break}{mood:like}Perhaps a little behind schedule, but no matter! You're here now!{break}I'm Cleo, and I'm Moonstone's resident historian and scholar.{break}{mood:happy}Any question you have, come to me first!

I wasn't sure how to, um, prepare for a date.{break}{mood:happy}So I did what I usually do... and researched!{break}{mood:like}Apparently, dating is a great cure for loneliness.{break}{mood:laugh}I suppose I didn't need a study to tell me that.{break}Sorry. I didn't have time to study small talk as well...
{mood:awkward}Oh, I'm... polishing my books that evening. Sorry.
We can talk about the weather!
{mood:like}How about we try somewhere a little different?

{mood:happy}Well, I got quite off-topic.{break}{mood:like}I began reading about the psychological effects of loneliness...{break}...and then I read a case study about rats raised in isolation!{break}And from there, I started reading about how rats are able to make friends...{break}...and then I wondered if I could source a rat from one of the bigger islands...{break}...and then...

{mood:like}Oh, good call.{break}The weather today was... quite typical for an island at this latitude.{break}Perhaps a touch colder than usual.{break}Is that... good small talk?{break}{mood:happy}I hope our next date has more interesting meteorological phenomena to discuss!
{mood:happy}Reading material!!!{break}I was just thinking I had run out of things to study, so thank you!

{mood:laugh}Oh no. I'm not nervous.{break}{mood:like}I'm simply trying to ensure there are no awkward silences.{break}I've read that those are unpleasant.{break}{mood:default}But I think I need to do a bit more research.{break}{mood:like}Thank you for this date. Good night.
{mood:like}This is so old!{break}I mean that in a good way! I love old things, so thank you!

-and we can actually trace back the location of the islands that way.{break}{mood:like}All you need to do is find a soil sample.{break}{mood:happy}Or better yet, a fossil! Those are incredibly valuable.{break}{mood:like}This island, for example, used to be on the south coast of a tropical land.{break}But, of course, the flora and fauna have evolved since then.{break}{mood:happy}Oh, you must have seen so many creatures on your adventures!{break}I'm so envious!
Oh, no thank you.{break}I have bad experiences with electricity.
I collect the ones I think look cool.
{mood:awkward}Oh dear...{break}{mood:laugh}ACHOO!{break}{mood:sad}Sorry, I have terrible grass allergies...{break}{mood:laugh}ACHOO!{break}{mood:awkward}No thank you!
{mood:dislike}Where were you? We had a date!

{mood:happy}That is exactly what I would do as well.{break}{mood:like}Although I suppose you don't study them.{break}{mood:awkward}Or dissect them!{break}{mood:like}Well, I have to be off.{break}Tomorrow I need to re-alphabetise my library. Good night!

{mood:like}Then you will have to keep exploring.{break}I believe Zed would love to hear from you about what you've discovered.{break}{mood:happy}But my interests in spirits are more... biological.{break}Zed wishes to catalogue them. I wish to know them.{break}But that's all I have time for tonight.{break}I must be off. Good night!
I got stuck on an island.

{mood:happy}I don't get to talk about my interests much! So, no!{break}{mood:default}But that wasn't very polite of you.{break}I think I'll just go back to my work, then.{break}Books will never let you down.{break}Good night!

-so everyone thinks Zed and I should be best friends.{break}But to be honest, we don't have much in common.{break}Zed is interested in the mechanics and logic of science.{break}{mood:like}I am much more interested in the anthropology and the natural side of things.{break}{mood:laugh}Anyway, I find astronomy terribly dull.{break}{mood:happy}All that dust and gas is nothing compared to the wonders of biology.{break}I find I prefer to look inwards, not outwards!
{mood:happy}It's my birthday!{break}{mood:like}Did you know that historically, cultures had many birthday traditions?{break}{mood:happy}My favourite tradition is gift-giving!
{mood:happy}Wow, thank you!{break}This is such a wonderful birthday, and you are so kind.
I agree! Animals are way more interesting!
{mood:laugh}It is traditional to be gracious even in the face of a terrible gift...{break}{mood:like}So, thank you. I think.
I wish my job allowed me to travel more.
Logic is the only true science.
{mood:like}It's the perfect day for curling up with a book, don't you think?

{mood:happy}Oh, all sorts, really.{break}{mood:like}Psychology, zoology, botany, paleontology, neurobiology, anatomy...{break}History, geography, philosophy, anthropology...{break}Sociology, archaeology, mycology, entomology AND etymology...{break}{mood:happy}Honestly, most things ending in "ology", "atomy", "sophy", or "graphy".{break}{mood:like}Oh, and pens. I really like fountain pens.{break}And making my own ink, and collecting different types of paper, and...
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a moonstone baracelet
It must be thrilling to represent a long tradition of alchemists.

{mood:happy}Yes, see?{break}{mood:like}Even just the psychology of your answer just then is fascinating.{break}Perhaps you're trying to impress me, or perhaps you truly agree.{break}{mood:happy}I can never know for sure! Maybe you don't even know!{break}{mood:default}Because the differences of our experiences make it impossible to ever truly know one another, and that means...

{mood:happy}A Moonstone bracelet! Did you make this yourself?{break}{mood:like}It's a beautiful example of the craft of Moonstone ritual items.{break}Did you know these are used here to signify a commitment between two lovers?
The days are starting to get longer again.

{mood:dislike}Well, I disagree.{break}You sound just like Zed, trying to get a rise out of me.{break}He does like to try to get on my nerves, just to start a debate!{break}{mood:default}Logic has its place in the world, but it is nothing without the study of PEOPLE.{break}After all, it was people that invented logic to begin with.{break}As the philosopher Kant would say...
Cleo, I want you to be my girlfriend.
{mood:like}I would love a hobby.{break}I doubt I have the time for one.
{mood:like}I wish I were good at gardening! Perhaps you can teach me.

Ofelia told me something after our last date.{break}{mood:laugh}Apparently, most people on beach dates don't talk about topics like natural philosophy and life sciences.{break}{mood:like}So... um... what do you want to talk about?
{mood:awkward}OH, I'm such an idiot... I thought you were just showing it to me!{break}{mood:happy}I would be honoured to be your girlfriend!
{mood:dislike}Apologies if I'm less than effervescent today.{break}I appear to have lost one of my research texts somewhere.
Ignore Ofelia, I like hearing about that stuff!
{mood:happy}You're welcome!{break}{mood:like}...Are you, um, going to... ask someone out, then?{break}They're a lucky person, whoever it is.
What are you into apart from books?
How do you know which plants are edible, and which are not?{break}{mood:dislike}I hope you're not just guessing.
Oh, NOW you want to hear from me?
// If heart level is too low, NPC will decline the bracelet
{mood:like}I love walking around the town. You notice so many things when you take your time.

{mood:happy}Oh, phew!{break}{mood:like}Sometimes I don't realise how much I talk until...{break}{mood:sad}Well, until it's too late.{break}{mood:like}But I'm glad you don't mind. That's quite a relief.{break}Would you be interested in walking along the beach before we bid each other adieu?
{mood:sad}I'm so sorry... I just don't think I have the time for a relationship right now.
Have you documented any new spirits lately?

Apart from books?{break}{mood:laugh}I'm just going to assume you're including things like papers, theses, and encyclopedias too.{break}{mood:like}Let's see... I like making my own clothes.{break}And I enjoy...{break}{mood:dislike}...I don't know that I can think of anything else.{break}{mood:happy}I guess maybe I need help finding hobbies outside of books!
{mood:sad}I wish I were able to meet my fellow researchers more often.{break}I miss the exchanging of ideas...

{mood:sad}Has it really been that unenjoyable for you to spend time with me?{break}I'm sorry to hear that.{break}Especially since I've really been enjoying these dates.{break}{mood:default}I shall take myself home, and practice being more perspicacious for the future.{break}Good night.
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a grass baracelet

{mood:like}Oh, goodness! A grass bracelet!{break}Did you know that these have a long and interesting history on the island communities?{break}They're used to signify the dissolution of a romantic relationship. It's fascinating stuff.
Some say I talk too much.{break}{mood:happy}But I simply prefer to be more loquacious than taciturn.
Cleo, I'm breaking up with you.
Gaiana is always telling me that brevity is a virtue.{break}But I think it is simply HER virtue.

You know, you being an alchemist is part of a long tradition.{break}In the Ancient Times, alchemists were the central pillar of a community.{break}They taught us how to live with spirits, and respect their power.{break}{mood:sad}But we haven't had an alchemist in living memory.{break}And I've tried to find out more information on them... but all the records are missing...
Don't worry, I'm not breaking up with you!
There was an Alchemist before me?
{mood:awkward}You're breaking up with me?!{break}{mood:sad}{npc:right}Oh... if that's what you want...
I've lost my notebook.{break}{mood:laugh}I hope I didn't drop it off the edge again...
{mood:laugh}Oh! That hadn't even occurred to me!{break}{mood:happy}Well, I'm glad you're not breaking up with me.{break}{mood:laugh}Be careful with that thing, though!
I must remember to buy new ink from the merchant next time they visit.
{mood:happy}Your Spirits are looking healthy and happy! Good job!

{mood:like}There was! But that's about all I know so far.{break}{mood:dislike}It's almost like someone destroyed all the records...{break}{mood:laugh}But why would they do that?{break}{mood:happy}I think I've been reading too many mystery novels.{break}{mood:like}Anyway... I should get back to it.{break}{mood:laugh}I know it's late, but I get my best work done in the quiet of night!

Oooh, good question. Like I said, not in living memory...{break}{mood:happy}So, before Paolo and Ofelia were born, at least. 50 years or so?{break}But there's seriously nothing else to go on.{break}{mood:dislike}I haven't found anything else, and I've tried!{break}{mood:like}Anyway... I should get back to it.{break}{mood:laugh}I know it's late, but I get my best work done in the quiet of night!
So, fireworks aren't really my thing... but...{break}{mood:happy}My lack of chemistry and physics knowledge aside, I do find them pretty.{break}{mood:like}Would you like to watch them with me?

{mood:dislike}I disagree. History is always important, because we can learn from it.{break}{mood:default}I feel like the last Alchemist... something happened. Something bad.{break}And I think it would be good to know what it was. So we can avoid it.{break}{mood:like}I think I'm going to call it a night. The research calls!
{mood:like}Your research aid with the Spirits is invaluable.
I'll get back to you on that.
I hope you are tending to your captured spirits.{break}You will need their strength to help you.

{mood:like}So, I've been reading about the Cataclysm lately. It's really interesting!{break}{mood:default}Before the Cataclysm, things were dire.{break}Lush forests were razed to make room for pastures.{break}Jungles were tainted by toxic rains from nearby factories.{break}Valleys were flooded by vicious electrical storms.{break}{mood:sad}The earth was dying.{break}{mood:default}Sorry, do you want me to stop?
{mood:happy}Wonderful!{break}{mood:like}I hear Zed has added some secret ingredient to the fireworks show this year...
{mood:sad}It's too cold. It's hard to turn pages with gloves on.
I need to find Tobin.{break}I have some questions about marine biology, and he may have the answers.
Yeah, let's talk about something else.
// When the player gives a spirit to an NPC (the matchmaker quest)
Did you study horticulture?{break}Or are you just naturally green-fingered?

So... Multiple rifts opened during the Cataclysm.{break}Malevolent forces made their way through the rifts and corrupted everything they touch.{break}We call them... the Creeping Dark.{break}{mood:sad}Towns, villages, people, Spirits... None are safe.{break}{mood:default}The current scholarly theory is that closing the rifts can halt the spread of the Creeping Dark.{break}{mood:sad}But for now... it's just a theory. We don't know for sure.{break}{mood:laugh}Sorry, I'm tired... let's pick this up next time!
{mood:love}He's...beautiful...{break}{mood:happy}Hey buddy! We're going to be best pals!{break}{mood:like}Here... Let me pay you for your service. Thank you.
I hope you're keeping notes on everything you see out in the field.{break}{mood:like}Your experiences are invaluable to documenting the local flora and fauna!

{mood:awkward}Wait... Don't they teach you this where you're from?{break}{mood:happy}Well then!{break}{mood:default}The Cataclysm was a catastrophic natural event that ripped all the islands up and threw them into the sky.{break}Some researchers believe it was caused by the state of the Earth. Others think it was random.{break}But during the Cataclysm, rifts opened in the sky, and let Dark Spirits into our world.{break}The current scholarly theory is that closing the rifts can calm them down again.{break}{mood:sad}But for now... it's just a theory. We don't know for sure.{break}{mood:laugh}Sorry, I'm tired... let's pick this up next time!
Goodness, look at this Spirit... so handsome.{break}{mood:sad}But not what I am looking for. My apologies, Alchemist.
I sat for a painting at Quill's last night.{break}{mood:like}He spent the whole time talking about how much he wants a pet.

{mood:sad}Oh, sorry.{break}I get carried away sometimes.{break}{mood:default}So, um... what do you normally talk about on dates?{break}{mood:laugh}I don't really know how to do small talk!{break}{mood:like}Tell you what... I might need to research dates a little bit more.{break}{mood:happy}Let's do this again when I'm better prepared!
I'm trying to work on a problem, but I'm struggling.{break}Perhaps I need to go for a walk to clear my head...
My gratitude for your help is immense, Alchemist!{break}Here is a small stipend for your troubles.
{mood:sad}I am quite fatigued today.{break}{mood:default}I stayed up reading last night. And the night before. And the night before...

{mood:like}You've been doing a great job with the Spirits, by the sounds of it.{break}I hope it hasn't been too hard on you, going out there all the time.{break}{mood:default}{npc:down}But you're not the only one out there... are you?{break}...{break}I guess by now you've heard of Waldo, right?
The first day of spring is an excellent time to plant crops.{break}{mood:happy}The increase in sun levels will stimulate chlorophyll production.
// Confirmation dialogue when you propose to marry

{mood:happy}Oh, you've met him! That's wonderful.{break}{mood:default}I hope he's doing okay out there.{break}{mood:sad}He had such an awful time... I think he tried to close one of the rifts himself.{break}It broke him, and then he broke his mind.{break}{mood:dislike}I've discovered some evidence that maybe...{break}{mood:default}No... never mind. I need to do more research before I talk about it.{break}{mood:like}Maybe next date, when I've done more reading, I'll tell you what I found!

{mood:like}Did you know that pre-cataclysm societies had romantic rituals?{break}There was a special festival around this time of year called Saint Valentine's.{break}They would exchange chocolates and written sentiments.{break}{mood:laugh}I think it's a little sad to only be romantic one day of the year!

{mood:like}Oh, you have?{break}{mood:happy}That's wonderful. I hope he's doing okay out there.{break}{mood:sad}He had such an awful time...  think he tried to close one of the rifts himself.{break}It broke him, and then he broke his mind.{break}{mood:dislike}I've discovered some evidence that maybe...{break}{mood:default}No... never mind. I need to do more research before I talk about it.{break}{mood:like}Maybe next date, when I've done more reading, I'll tell you what I found!
{mood:dislike}The precipitation levels today are less than ideal.

{mood:sad}Oh, that's not nice. He's had a hard time.{break}I think he may have tried to close one of the rifts... and it broke him.{break}{mood:default}In fact, I recently read something interesting...{break}...No, no, I shouldn't speculate until my research is more thorough.{break}Maybe next time I can tell you more about what I found...
{mood:like}I adore the sound of soft rain on the water.{break}It sounds like a lullaby.
{mood:happy}Sorry, I, oh my god! I'm usually not lost for words, but... really? REALLY really?{break}YES YES YES YES YES!
{mood:like}The fresh air up here helps me formulate thoughts more clearly.

{mood:awkward}Sorry about being late! I was reading something fascinating.{break}{mood:like}You know I said there were zero records of the last Alchemist?{break}...{break}{mood:happy}I FOUND SOME.{break}{mood:default}And I was right. Someone destroyed the records... on purpose.
{mood:dislike}...You are not a very smart person sometimes.
When it rains up here, it almost seems like you can touch the clouds.
Doesn't the water look beautiful in the crepuscular light?
// If too early to marry, NPC will decline the bracelet
I wish I had studied fluid dynamics.{break}Water is so fascinating to watch.
{mood:like}That's very romantic and sweet of you, but... well...{break}I always pictured myself marrying someone I knew really well. And I don't think we're there yet. I'm sorry!

{mood:dislike}The Alchemist destroyed the records... to hide what they did.{break}They were experimenting with risky rituals, and they opened a rift by accident.{break}{mood:sad}Instead of fixing it, they destroyed the evidence, and fled.{break}I don't know what happened to them. It was a long time ago.{break}{mood:default}But one bad Alchemist doesn't mean you're all bad. I believe in you.{break}{mood:like}I know you can fix it! And if you want help... just ask!{break}Let's walk home before it gets too late.
Are you here to see Ossono?

It's been such a long time since then. Besides, these records are important.{break}{mood:dislike}I discovered that the last Alchemist actually CAUSED the rift closest to us.{break}They did risky rituals and misused their powers, and accidentally opened a rift.{break}{mood:sad}And then... they destroyed all the records. And fled.{break}{mood:default}Well, almost all the records. I managed to find one that told me all this.{break}{mood:happy}Don't worry. Nothing bad will happen. I promise!{break}{mood:like}Let's walk home before it gets too late.
What's it like to venture into the dungeons and caves around here?{break}{mood:awkward}I would be so afraid.

{mood:dislike}Records are for reading! If we bury history, we run the risk of forgetting it.{break}{mood:default}And what I discovered... is a big deal.{break}{mood:sad}The last Alchemist actually CAUSED the rift closest to us.{break}{mood:dislike}They went against Alchemist's Guild guidelines and did some risky ritual which opened a rift.{break}And then they destroyed all records and fled Moonstone Island.{break}{mood:like}Oh, don't worry! We trust you. I trust you. You've been nothing but good.{break}{mood:happy}And I think... you can fix what they did.{break}{mood:like}Come, let's walk home before it gets too late.
{mood:happy}Ahhh, you both look AMAZING! I can't wait to add this wedding to my History of Moonstone Island!
Yesterday Ossono asked for my help inventing a new beer.{break}{mood:happy}It's not my area of expertise, but I relish the challenge!
{mood:like}Another glorious day stretches out ahead of us.
It's almost the summer equinox.{break}{mood:happy}I love when the days get longer!{break}It means I can fit in more natural light reading sessions.

The very first post-Cataclysm Alchemist was a woman named Dhriti.{break}She was multi-talented - she could carve a chair from scratch, sew a beautiful gown, forge a sword...{break}{mood:like}And she even knew a bit of magic.{break}{mood:default}One day, a ruler of another island kidnapped her, hoping to force her to make him a powerful weapon.{break}She refused, but she could not escape.{break}So she asked him for permission to grow her own garden...{break}{mood:like}And in that garden, she grew a tree infused with magic.{break}She used that tree to craft a flying broom, and flew away from the island.{break}{mood:happy}That's why you learn farming and flying just as she did all those years ago!
{mood:happy}It's Ferra's birthday today!{break}{mood:like}If you need gift ideas... she enjoys cold things. And ore.
What happened to her after that?
Let's stay a bit longer, ok?
{mood:like}Today is Ossono's birthday!{break}Make sure to say hello to her before the day is through!

"The people of the old kingdom turned on the Spirits..."{break}"...they built traps and mechanical guardians to try to keep them out of the sacred places they once shared..."{break}{mood:happy}The book I'm reading is fascinating!{break}{mood:sad}But we still don't know what made the old kingdom turn against the Spirits so cruelly...
I have to farm because of one random lady?

{mood:happy}Wooo! Party time!{break}I had to get a lil tipsy for the party 'cus I kept thinking about, you know, bad rift stuff.{break}I mean, I've read lotsa books. I *know* what happens when a rift is left open.{break}{mood:laugh}Haha. Scary.{break}{mood:like}Ammmnnnyways. I gotta go... sit down. Thanks for helping us not get aaaaall rifty. *hic*

Geological research tells us that the world below is now nothing but ocean.{break}Before, it had landmasses... but then the islands were ripped up and catapulted into the troposphere.{break}I wonder what it's like to sail on an ocean planet...

She lived for a while on another island, helping to heal people and Spirits.{break}But one day, she took to her broom in the early morning and flew beneath the clouds.{break}No one knew why, or where she went.{break}She was never seen again.{break}{mood:like}Are you ready to get out? I think I am.
I'm terribly sorry, but I was in the middle of a paragraph...{break}I need to get back to reading, or I'll lose my place.

Actually... I don't think I ever read what the weapon was.{break}She never made it, after all.{break}{mood:dislike}But it is for the best that we don't know what the weapon was.{break}If we did, someone might try to recreate it.{break}After the Cataclysm, I hope the people of the islands understand that we can never let it happen again.{break}{mood:like}I think that's enough about history for one day, though.{break}Are you ready to get out? I think I am.
{mood:happy}Ahhh, amazing! I've been craving cake ALL. DAY. Thanks!
I'm performing a study on the local aquatic life.{break}I need to check that the Creeping Dark hasn't affected them yet.

{mood:dislike}She was no random lady!{break}{mood:default}Her alchemical discoveries were hugely important in the development of island societies.{break}She is, in my opinion, the underappreciated founder of our way of life.{break}{mood:dislike}You should have more respect, since you are following in her footsteps.{break}{mood:default}I think I'm ready to get out now. Are you?
{mood:angry}I can't get anything right today!{break}{mood:dislike}I need a break.
{mood:happy}You came! Oh, I'm so excited to see what will happen!{break}{mood:like}Are you ready to start? Maybe... you'd like to watch it with me?
I have never been able to understand agriculture.{break}The weather here is too capricious for outdoor farming to be predictable.{break}{mood:awkward}How can you deal with the uncertainty?!

Have you found the rift yet?{break}I can potentially help out if not.{break}There have been a few scholars and scientists who claim to have seen it from afar.{break}Descriptions tend to agree that it is a source of light, but not much else.{break}{mood:sad}And you're the only one who can close it, I'm afraid.
Don't tell Zed I said this, but...{break}Sometimes I wonder if he has a crush on me....
What happens if I can't fix things?
{mood:like}I was just telling Ossono about your latest findings.
{mood:like}Ah! I think I just saw a meteor...{break}{mood:happy}Are you ready to commence with the festivities? Would you like to watch with me, or someone else...?
{mood:like}I am partial to a cold beer on a hot day.{break}I think I'll peruse Ossono's menu at the tavern this evening.
Why do *I* have to fix it all?
If you're wondering why I'm working on a weekend...{break}{mood:like}I work every weekend!

{mood:sad}I don't know.{break}We can speculate, of course...{break}But the outcomes are almost unanimously catastrophic.{break}The Creeping Dark is a disease. It corrupts living beings.{break}{mood:dislike}We have to destroy it. We HAVE to save our way of life.{break}{mood:default}And, for what it's worth... I believe in you.{break}{mood:like}You are strong, and brave, and capable. I know you can do it.{break}{mood:love}I am just happy to have had the chance to discover how powerful you are for myself.
Sitting in a hot spring in hot weather seems like a bad idea.{break}But hot water stimulates your sweat glands...{break}{mood:happy}...Consequently helping you cool down faster!

{mood:like}That's very confident of you.{break}{mood:default}I hope you're right.{break}{mood:sad}It's a threat to our way of life. And a threat to our life in general.{break}{mood:like}But having gotten to know you... I think you can do it.{break}I KNOW you can do it. You're incredibly capable.{break}{mood:love}And I'm happy to have had the chance to discover that for myself.
{mood:like}I baked an authentic Old Kingdom recipe!{break}{mood:laugh}It's... well... it smells terrible, honestly. But it's history brought to life!!

{mood:sad}Because... that's just the way of it.{break}It's not some grand hero's quest. It's just that you're the only one with the skills needed.{break}{mood:default}You turned up at the right time, in the right place.{break}All we can ask is that you use those skills to help us all.{break}I hope you choose to do so.
{mood:happy}Happy fall!{break}{mood:like}There used to be several traditional fall festivals, down below.{break}{mood:sad}We don't celebrate them any more, which is a shame.

-my tutor tried to help, but what could she do?{break}{mood:sad}So I ended up doing the group project on my own.{break}{mood:default}I would have relished the help, but it just wasn't possible.{break}{mood:sad}I'll still never understand what I did to make the others dislike me.{break}At university, I tried so very hard to be less chatty.{break}I suppose it wasn't enough.

I keep finding old maps and illustrations of globes depicting the world below.{break}But they're all out of date...{break}It's so strange to see the landmasses that used to be down there. It's all just ocean now.
{mood:like}The matutinal light out here is breathtaking.
I was just finishing up my work.{break}{mood:like}Would you like a cup of tea?{break}{mood:laugh}No, wait... I'm all out of tea. Sorry!
You're still a bit too chatty.
